Articles.Content: No Body Hill

I fill the hill back up.

Yes Body Hill

Hill is rescaled  with JNSQ (x2.7).

Rescaled and larger hill

I send the *HSP Kraken Firefly* and it fills the hill with tentacles from K-bombs.

My Kraken Hill

P.S: *HSP* means *HyperSpacePlane*.

P.S.2: this idea took seven and a half hours of hard calculating to my computer.

I'll send a Anti-Kraken Motorized Vehicle to neutralize the Kraken in your Hill

My A-K Motor-Vehicle Hill
Hilley Davidson

I change *names.cfg* and a hill is now a Kanyon.

My Kanyon with the A-K Motor-vehicle crashed on the bottom

DPRK takes the hill.

Kan Yon (or Yeong) Hill.

Fashion moves in.

DKNY Hill.

Hidden bomb in hill has been detonated!

Exploded Hill

I un-undo the changes to *names.cfg* and the hill is now an endless sea.

My sea with nothing on it

Until suddenly bobbing to surface.

My floating secret volcano base Hill.

I drop a Z-bomb in your volcano and it erupts, and eventually gets upside-down because of bad weight distribution made possible by the lava rivers.

It floods and sinks.

My endless, empty sea with an upside-down flooded sunken volcano at the bottom

A Moon passes above.

Tidal Wave Hill

Unfortunately tidal waves have a quite short lifespan.

My calm sea with nothing but water and air on it.

Underwater volcanoes erupt!  They form islands

Sea with some islands (and water and salt since it's a sea)

Wow.

Its Laythe!  

Jool’s ~~hill~~ moon.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-07T01:16:47Z" title="01/07/2022 01:16  AM" data-short="2 yr">January 7, 2022</time> by Admiral Fluffy**

Laythe Is terraformed to become Kerbin and Spacecraft carry Laythe to Kerbin's orbit.  Science Fiction.

Kerbin clone

Kerbin has mountains to the North from <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr>

To The North Mountains

I reach the north mountains... and claim it!

My Hill.

I use the map decals from Kerbal Konstructions to reform the terrain and invert the landscape.

My long and winding hill.
Amon Sûl

But it's a dream and when we wake up we're back on the endless sea.

My empty sea with *infinite depth* (means *no floor for volcanoes* etc)

I use KK to place a single pad at the top of the sea.    It has a button (Which I press) to turn off the computer and save this world to the hard drive.   I then destroy the power cord for the computer and the thing used to remove the hard drive permanently!!!! 

My Island

Oh, and I also take the computer and lock it in a 100 foot lead vault and throw it into the sea, then build a nuclear bomb proof "normal" looking section of the sea around it.

\*Kraken Summons\*

Oh hey look!

It's an open hill!
